phrases: jou jou yuu jou ban jin ma ji kai chou
ki mi wa best best friend
(furai!) cho tto fu za ke te mi ta ra
(faito!) ke n ka shi cha tta to ki mo
sa su ga sai kou friend
wa ke wa ka nnai nai
jou jou yuu jou ban jin ma ji kai chou
cha cha la cha la cha cha
You are my best, best friend!
When I joke around a bit,
You joke around more in response.
Being together 24 hours a day is not a problem.
Just like twins, or a parent and child, or clone cyborgs.
Then is not there no reason to clear your eyes?
Those are completely, completely different issues.
Even when I get in a fight with you,
(Down!) even when I get really down,
(Shy!) even when I feel like I want to be alone,
before I realise it, you are right there; we will be together even in death!
I want to be with you.
It is fun, is not it?
As expected of my best friend!
And then yo de le hi hoo!
I do not get it at all!
It is better than I imagined, the absolute best!
Even if I say this and that, we are still friends.
Cha Cha La Cha La Cha Cha!
Let me have that wonderful love one more time
Ever since the day I swore to put my life on the line
I have had many wonderful memories
That time we saw the same flower
We both said it was beautiful
Our hearts are no longer together
Let me have that wonderful love one more time
Let me have that wonderful love one more time
Do not make a funny lip expression.
Expiration date is marked on the bottom of the bread.
It is been getting colder lately.
At least explain what is going on!
And Yukko, you write the page numbers with this pencil...
Oh no, it is not a big deal.
She used to hide the fact that she drew from everyone.
It does not really matter any more.
Well, I submitted something a while ago,
and I got a reply saying they will be waiting for more.
That is when I started to think it was odd to hide it.
They probably thought you had talent!
Could you let me see for a second?
You do not have to read it.
Sorry, let me go get some air...
Do you want me to go with you?
No, you guys came to help Naganohara-san on her draft,
and I will be right back anyway.
I do not have time to waste like this.
We are going to finish it all up before Nano-chan comes back.
Tomorrow is the deadline for submission!
I am a pretty good artist myself!
Hey, Mai-chan, what did you draw?!
TL Note: This is a classic sculpture from the Kamakura period of a monk chanting sutras.
That is not what I am asking.
Because the blank space in the background was weeping.
Just hurry up and erase it with white-out.
I do not want anything fancy.
That was possibly the worst pain I have ever experienced.
I guess I will shade the hair.
tell me right away if you make a mistake or something.
I need to hurry and fix it!
You did not draw anything extra this time, did you?
This is supposed to be a really nice palace in Daikanyama!
I told you not to draw things!
Why do you keep drawing things?!
I just want you to erase it.
I was able to make him cool-looking.
Showing her this would be like throwing oil on a fire!
Did you actually erase it this time?
Why do you keep doing these things?!
Because this manga is not very interesting.
I will give you a new page,
so just lay out frames in the same way as that page.
It is no longer a problem of whether it looks like the character or not...
Showing her this would be like throwing oil on a fire!
It is just the frames, right?
Once upon a time, there was an old man and an old lady.
The old man went to gather firewood in the mountains.
A soldier came out of a peach.
The more panicked I get, the more messed up it gets.
There is no way she cou - huh?
It is way too far off!
I will go back to that time...
I will go back to that time...
I do not have any more manuscript paper!
Um, do not run in the hallwa -
What are you doing in a place like this?
When you were in high school, Naganohara-san,
did you ever have that kind of problem?
Like, feeling the protective gear becoming incredibly hea -
Shiitake Zanmai sure is a weird manga!
She is completely worthless at anything other than kendo.
Are you talking about something interesting?
Do not you have a national tournament coming up, Naganohara-san?
Even Mihoshi says she has to train -
I came to do some shopping.
I will give you these crackers.
What are you doing, hanging out around here?
I thought I should change my image every now and then.
Ready or not, here I come!
Whim can be a frightening thing.
I normally would not play along with such a kid's game,
but I guess I have to play with you from time to time.
I definitely will not be found here.
She is a kid, so she might be hiding somewhere outside.
Let us take a short break.
But we might never find her.
But why did you come out?
It is not hide-and-seek like that.
I started to think that you would never find me.
You are just making more laundry.
Well, I guess I have no choice.
This time, I will be it.
I will wash it for you.
You will ruin it, so do not worry about it.
No, you will definitely ruin it.
And what did you say then?
See, I am glad that you wanted to help out,
but you are the one who spilled the ink, Yukko.
so I asked you to go buy some for me, and what did you say?
At that time, what did you say?
Should we leave who goes to buy it...
You should go buy it, since you spilled the ink!
I still have work to do!
When you finally agreed to go, what did you say?
If you do not hurry up, the stationery shop will close!
Why are you asking that now?!
What did you say when you were putting on your shoes?
By the way, I feel a bit sick.
Make a sacrifice for the sake of justice!
How long do you intend to stall?!
Besides, it is not cold at all today!
But what did you end up buying?
I asked for some manuscript paper!
When I said that, what did you pull out?
I am in a lot of trouble!
What do you expect me to do?!
When I said that, what did you say?!
This is not something you can brush off!
Where the heck did hyacinth come from?!
But still, I believed in you!
You bought the manuscript paper for me!
It was just a stupid gag!
TL Note: Hyacinth is a pun on hiyasu, which means to cool.
Which one of us should cool her head?!
Which one of us is a hyacinth?!
So I asked you one more time!
You had bought the manuscript paper, had not you?
I do not even care about the hyacinth!
And what did you finally take out?
I guess I will write a pornographic story.
What are you trying to do?!
The truth is not always correct, right?
Since you were not helping at all, I asked Nano for help...
I asked her to buy some manuscript paper.
Her eyes were glued to it!
I had no choice, so I went to ask Mai-chan!
Mai-chan, could you buy some for me?
She always goes at her own pace!
Mai-chan's pace is really Mai pace!
when you saw that note, Yukko, do you remember what you said?
Is this a prank by God...
It is a trick by the devil!
It was already a trick by the devil when you two came over!
I do not want to hear your excuses!
I do not want your sees or your peanuts!
I am the gondolier of dreams: manga manuscript paper!
Now is the time to hold your head high and reach for your dreams!
